'''Character Demo''' are videos released by official [[Genshin Impact]] media that showcase [[Playable Characters|playable characters]]' model and animation designs and skills.

The Character Demos for 5-star characters usually feature special animated scenes while those for 4-star characters only show their in-game movesets. Qiqi, Mona, and Keqing are the only 5-star characters with no animated scenes.

===Soundtracks===
Character Demo videos feature exclusive soundtracks that do not play in-game.

The album [[The Stellar Moments]] contains the Demo soundtracks of characters released from Version 1.0 to Version 1.2, except the one for Kaeya.

The album [[The Stellar Moments Vol. 2]] contains the Demo soundtracks of characters released from Version 1.3 to Version 2.2.
